title: All Together Now - Danmark
overview: A competition with a twist, All Together Now - Danmark sees a range of talented singers take to the stage to perform in front of The 100 - a unique panel of music experts and performers from all over Danmark. If any of The 100 like what they hear, they can stand up, join in and sing along. The greater the number that join in, the higher the act's score. At the end of the series, one act will walk away with the amazing cash prize. So, who can get The 100 on their feet and singing along?
